flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
It has a compassionate personality, but if it is
angered, it completely destroys its surroundings
with its intense breath.

This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves
children most of all. It comes from deep in the
mountains to play with children it likes in town.

If a child it has made friends with is bullied,
Drampa will find the bully’s house and burn it to
the ground.

It appears in towns and plays with the children.
Drampa will protect kids when they’re in danger,
so their moms don’t have to worry.

The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles
in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play
with the children living in the towns below.

Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until
it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a
gale and flattens everything around.
